extension.name: EasyStaging Pro Package
extension.author: Craig Phillips
extension.copyright: Copyright Â© 2015 Craig Phillips Pty Ltd. All rights reserved.
extension.description:
EasyStaing Pro Component and Plugin

EasyStaging Pro is a combination of standard Joomla plugins and a component that allow secured staging sites to push changes out to public websites all from within your Joomla Admin area.

Credits

EasyStaging Pro for Joomla is an commercial product created by CPPL for all your custom software projects.
